<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# SYNTH Music & MORE is a synth-focused musical pack
<!--text-->
SYNTH Music & MORE is a synth-focused musical pack designed to help any game developer "craft that aesthetic synth vibe" to beautifully enhance a game's music design. 

This musical resource pack is also both exclusive and inclusive.

It primarily features synth music and yet it provides an eclectic mix of other genres as well. 


■ Synth-Focused plus an Assorted Variety of Other Genres  
In its own way, it can be the best of both worlds: specialized but embracive too!

■ Includes BGM Tracks with Musical Vocals / NOT JUST PURELY INSTRUMENTAL
(This is evident in "Antenna Satellite", "Kawaii Pop Beats" and "Cymbalistic Ballad". )

■ Beyond Synth Music
 It features other genres such as Cinematic Scores, Rock, Action, Spy Music and MORE!

■ Exclusive Extras
"SYNTH Music & MORE" includes Exclusive Material in the form of Sci-Fi Ambient Tracks. 

If you're looking for a synth-focused and multi-genre music pack - in a single package…

Then "SYNTH Music & MORE" might be the missing piece of your musical puzzle!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 【Musical Content Outline / ESSENTIAL SPECS】

●24 Main Musical Soundtracks ( SYNTH Music & OTHER GENRES )
●1 Christmas BGM Remix by Media Maiden® 
●Exclusive "Maker Extra" :  3 Sci-Fi Ambient Soundtracks
